mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT, B.BRANCH, B.TYPE, B.CHANGE_NAME, B.ORIGIN_NAME, B.USER_NO, B.CLASS_NO, B.BOARD_STATUS, U.USER_NAME FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_USER U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE B.TYPE = 1 AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BRANCH, TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, USER_NO, CLASS_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{branch}, 1, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{userNo}, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, UPDATE_DATE, TYPE, CREATED_DATE FROM TB_RESUME_BOARD WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, BRANCH, U.USER_NAME, CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_USER U USING (USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{bno}
